mapper.select: select count(*) from student s where s.clazz_id = #{clazzId} group by s.clazz_id
mapper.insert: insert into student (name, no, gender, phone, id_card, is_college, address, degree, graduation_date, clazz_id, create_time, update_time) value (#{name},#{no},#{gender},#{phone},#{idCard},#{isCollege},#{address},#{degree},#{graduationDate}, #{clazzId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
